Name: Porto-Novo
Description: Porto-Novo is the capital of Benin, located on the coast in the southeastern part of the country.

Name: Abomey
Description: Abomey is a town and former capital of Benin.

Name: Cotonou
Description: Cotonou is the largest city in Benin and the country's primary port of entry for visitors. The city is located in the south of the country, on the coastline.

Name: Grand Popo
Description: Grand Popo is a city in Benin.

Name: Kétou
Description: Kétou is a medium sized town in Benin. It is the seat of a very old Yoruba kingdom and therefore has a particularly strong cultural heritage. Ketou is very much off the beaten-track, making for an interesting visit.

Name: Parakou
Description: Parakou is a city in Northern Benin.

Name: Malanville
Description: Malanville is a city in Northern Benin.

Name: Natitingou
Description: Natitingou is a town in Northern Benin.

Name: Tanguiéta
Description: Tanguiéta is a town in Northern Benin

Name: Pendjari National Park
Description: Pendjari National Park, is in Northern Benin.

Name: W National Park
Description: W National Park [dead link] is in a trans-border park, with the most important areas in  Southwestern Niger.
